infos.value: Do what yer will with it.
What is that supposed to mean?
These villagers are devoted to that filthy Oelde, aren't they?
Are yer saying yer'd pardon such treacherous scum?
Heh heh heh. That worked better than I expected.
Don't act like you can't hear it...the shrieks and cries of the villagers.
There's gonna be no coming back from this for that Leonis whelp.
